fields.name: title
fields.value: MetLife LTC LifeStage Advantage

fields.name: subtitle
fields.value: Plans-at-a-Glance

fields.name: brand
fields.value: MetLife

fields.name: plan_name_simple
fields.value: SIMPLE ADVANTAGE4 PLAN

fields.name: plan_name_custom
fields.value: CUSTOM ADVANTAGE4 PLAN

fields.name: plan_type_simple
fields.value: Comprehensive; Monthly Reimbursement (Cash Benefit Rider available - see below)

fields.name: plan_type_custom
fields.value: Comprehensive; Monthly Reimbursement (Cash Benefit Rider available - see below)

fields.name: issue_ages_simple
fields.value: 18 - 61 (premiums banded 18 - 30)

fields.name: issue_ages_custom
fields.value: 18 - 84 (premiums banded 18 - 30)

fields.name: monthly_benefit_and_total_benefit_labels
fields.value: Monthly Benefit Amount (MBA) and Total Benefit Amount (TBA)

fields.name: optional_riders_heading
fields.value: OPTIONAL RIDERS AVAILABLE WITH BOTH SIMPLE ADVANTAGE AND CUSTOM ADVANTAGE

fields.name: rider_shared_care
fields.value: Shared Care Rider: Insured and spouse/partner** can access benefits under each other's policy once the TBA under their own policy is exhausted. When insured dies, remaining TBA under his/her policy is transferred to the spouse's/partner's policy at no extra cost. Rider available at any time, subject to underwriting; Both spouse/partners must have identical policies

fields.name: rider_nonforfeiture
fields.value: Nonforfeiture Rider: Provides some benefits if policy lapses for nonpayment of premiums or if cancelled by insured. Rider must be in effect for 3 years and be in effect when the policy ends. Provides full MBA and a reduced TBA equal to the greater of: the total amount of premium paid; or 1x MBA. Available at initial application only.

fields.name: rider_cash_benefit
fields.value: Cash Benefit Rider: Full MBA paid as cash payment (regardless of actual charges incurred) instead of reimbursement for covered services. Available at initial application only; $1MM TBA not available. Benefits paid over annual IRC limit may be taxable.

fields.name: guaranteed_purchase_option_heading
fields.value: GUARANTEED PURCHASE OPTION (GPO) (INCLUDED WITH SIMPLE ADVANTAGE ONLY)

fields.name: guaranteed_purchase_option_points
fields.value: Insured able to purchase additional coverage every 3 years, up to age 65, with no additional underwriting. Premium for increase in coverage is at attained age rates. Lifetime maximum increase available is 2x initial TBA and 2x initial MBA. Minimum of 25% of initial coverage must be purchased each time GPO is exercised.

fields.name: benefit_increase_heading
fields.value: BENEFIT INCREASE OPTIONS (AVAILABLE WITH CUSTOM ADVANTAGE ONLY)

fields.name: future_purchase_option_summary
fields.value: FUTURE PURCHASE OPTION (FPO): Increases the MBA and remaining portion of the TBA automatically by 5% of the MBA/remaining TBA in effect at the end of the previous policy year. Available subject to certain conditions and underwriting.

fields.name: footer_note
fields.value: FOR PRODUCER OR BROKER/DEALER USE ONLY. NOT FOR PUBLIC DISTRIBUTION. Metropolitan Life Insurance Company (MetLife)

rows.value: Comprehensive; Monthly Reimbursement (Cash Benefit Rider available - see below)
Comprehensive; Monthly Reimbursement (Cash Benefit Rider available - see below)

fields.name: Title
fields.value: Policy Features and Benefits May Vary By State

fields.name: Section Header
fields.value: FEATURES & BENEFITS AVAILABLE WITH BOTH SIMPLE ADVANTAGE™ AND CUSTOM ADVANTAGE™

fields.name: Home and Community Care
fields.value: Reimbursed up to 100% of MBA; Home care services including Nursing Care, Therapy services, Care Advisory Services, Homemaker Services; Services provided by a Home Care Aide, Social Worker or Independent Caregiver; Hospice Care; Adult Day Care

fields.name: Facility Care
fields.value: Reimbursed up to 100% of MBA; Assisted Living Facility, Nursing Home, Hospice Facility

fields.name: Elimination Period
fields.value: 100 Calendar Days; Once per lifetime and cumulative

fields.name: Alternate Service Provision
fields.value: A MetLife Care Coordinator may authorize benefits for OLTC services not specifically defined as covered services under the policy, as long as the service meets needs of the insured and is a cost-effective alternative.

fields.name: Bed Reservation
fields.value: Reimburses up to 50 days per calendar year for actual charges incurred, to reserve insured's bed in a facility for any reason

fields.name: Return of Premium
fields.value: If insured dies on or before his/her 70th birthday, 100% of premiums paid, minus any benefits paid or payable, will be returned to insured's beneficiary or estate

fields.name: International Benefit
fields.value: Pays a cash benefit equal to 50% of the MBA when the insured is outside the U.S.; TBA limited to lesser of TBA loss benefits paid while insured in U.S. or 2% (or 50% of TBA); EP for International Benefit is doubled to 200 Calendar Days; If Cash Benefit Rider is added, International Benefit is modified; pays benefits outside US at 100% of MBA; EP will be 100 Calendar Days

fields.name: Contingent Benefit Upon Lapse
fields.value: Limited coverage if policy ends due to non-payment of premiums or insured's written request to cancel, following a substantial premium increase; Provides full MBA and a reduced TBA equal to greater of: the total amount of premium paid; or 1x MBA; Total benefits paid will not exceed the TBA immediately prior to nonforfeiture date

fields.name: Initial Needs Assessment
fields.value: 1 visit per lifetime; EP does not need to be satisfied; If Care Management organization is selected by MetLife – no cost to the insured; If Care Management organization is selected by the insured – reimbursed up to $275 per lifetime

fields.name: Premium Waiver
fields.value: Premiums waived when EP is satisfied and the insured is receiving payment of benefits

fields.name: Coordination of Benefits
fields.value: Coordination of Benefits (COB) and non-duplication of coverage with other MetLife LTCI coverage and Medicare (COB and non-duplication of coverage not applicable with Cash Benefit Rider)

fields.name: Additional Information Section Header
fields.value: ADDITIONAL INFORMATION FOR ALL POLICIES

fields.name: Payment Options
fields.value: Standard Pay: Annual, Semi-Annual, Quarterly, Monthly (EFT); 10 Year Premium Payment Rider – available at initial application only; N/A with FPO or GPO; May impact the tax deductibility of the premium; consult a tax advisor

fields.name: Care Coordination Services
fields.value: MetLife Care Coordinators are available to answer questions about LTC coverage, services and discounts in the insured's area; an insured can also call for advice about caring for a loved one who needs LTC services, even if their family member is not insured with MetLife

fields.name: Discounts
fields.value: 30% Spousal**; 15% Marital**; 15% Residential – 10% Preferred Health (N/A for insureds age 80 - 84) – 5% or 10% Multi-Life Discount for approved cases

fields.name: Underwriting Classes
fields.value: Preferred (N/A for insureds age 80 - 84), Standard & Substandard (Always quote Standard!)

fields.name: Save Age
fields.value: Premium based on age 30 days prior to application date (underwriting requirements based on age at date of signed application)

fields.name: Policy Effective Dates
fields.value: With Premium (Conditional Receipt may apply): Date all underwriting requirements are met; Without Premium: 28 days following underwriting approval date

fields.name: Free Look Period
fields.value: Insured has 30 days to review policy and if desired, return it for a full refund

fields.name: Policy Delivery
fields.value: Policy Delivery Receipt (PDR) must be signed within 30 days of Policy Approval Date

fields.name: Company Name
fields.value: Metropolitan Life Insurance Company

fields.name: Company Address
fields.value: New York, NY 10166

tables.caption: Features & Benefits (left column = Feature, right column = Details)

Limited coverage if policy ends due to non-payment of premiums or insured's written request to cancel, following a substantial premium increase; provides full MBA and a reduced TBA equal to greater of total amount of premium paid or 1x MBA; total benefits paid will not exceed the TBA immediately prior to the nonforfeiture date

notes: Document is a MetLife Long-Term Care product brochure / policy features sheet (fields like title, plan names, benefit details are present) — not a facility invoice, CMR form, or UB-04 claim form.

No evidence of invoice numbers, policyholder billing info, claim service dates, provider billing amounts, signatures, or UB04 provider blocks was found in the provided fields/tables, so invoice/CMR/UB04 sections are left empty per instructions.
Page-level fields and tables (e.g., 'title', 'Company Name', plan tables) were used to determine document type; see provided OCR field/table IDs in input for traceability.

prompt.system:
You are building canonical data for illumifin claims processing. You are given OCR extraction results (fields and tables) for a multi-page document along with page-level document type hints. Classify the overall content into one or more of: 'facility_invoice', 'cmr_form', 'ub04'. Input JSON includes a pages array where each page has fields with IDs, values, and normalized bounding boxes (x, y, width, height all between 0 and 1 relative to the page). When populating sources, always reference the provided field IDs (fieldId) or table IDs (tableId) and include the page number. Table metadata includes column headers/keys and cell-level bounding boxes; include the column name when pointing to table sources. Then produce a JSON object matching this schema exactly: {
  "generatedAt": ISO8601 timestamp,
  "documentTypes": [string],
  "facilityInvoice": { optional, object with keys "general" (dict of canonical field name -> value object) and "lineItems" (list of dict canonicalName->value object) },
  "cmrForm": { optional, similar structure with sections },
  "ub04": { optional, provider fields },
  "notes": [string]
 }.
Each canonical value object must be of form {"value": string or null, "confidence": number 0-1, "sources": [ {"page": int optional, "fieldId": string optional, "tableId": string optional, "column": string optional } ] }. Confidence is your mapping confidence (not OCR confidence). Populate as many facility invoice fields as possible: policyNumber, policyholderName, policyholderAddress, providerName, providerAddress, invoiceNumber, invoiceDate, taxId, totalAmount, balanceDue, credits. For lineItems include description, startDate, endDate, unitType, quantity, amount, balance, totalDue, credits. For CMR include policyNumber, policyholderName, policyholderAddress, providerName, providerAddress, serviceFrom, serviceThrough, careLevelSelection, absenceIndicator (yes/no) plus absenceDetails (departureDate, returnDate, reason, admissionDate, dischargeDate), insuranceIndicator and insuranceSelections (medicare, medicaid, other), signaturePresent (yes/blank) and signatureDate. For UB04 include providerName, providerAddress. Always provide an empty object for a section if it applies but data is missing. If no content applies, set documentTypes to ['other'] and return empty sections. Do not invent data. Leave value as null when evidence is absent. Provide reasoning notes in the notes array when confidence is low.

values.value: OPTIONAL RIDERS AVAILABLE WITH BOTH SIMPLE ADVANTAGE AND CUSTOM ADVANTAGE

fields.bestValue: OPTIONAL RIDERS AVAILABLE WITH BOTH SIMPLE ADVANTAGE AND CUSTOM ADVANTAGE

values.value: Shared Care Rider: Insured and spouse/partner** can access benefits under each other's policy once the TBA under their own policy is exhausted. When insured dies, remaining TBA under his/her policy is transferred to the spouse's/partner's policy at no extra cost. Rider available at any time, subject to underwriting; Both spouse/partners must have identical policies

fields.bestValue: Shared Care Rider: Insured and spouse/partner** can access benefits under each other's policy once the TBA under their own policy is exhausted. When insured dies, remaining TBA under his/her policy is transferred to the spouse's/partner's policy at no extra cost. Rider available at any time, subject to underwriting; Both spouse/partners must have identical policies

values.value: Nonforfeiture Rider: Provides some benefits if policy lapses for nonpayment of premiums or if cancelled by insured. Rider must be in effect for 3 years and be in effect when the policy ends. Provides full MBA and a reduced TBA equal to the greater of: the total amount of premium paid; or 1x MBA. Available at initial application only.

fields.bestValue: Nonforfeiture Rider: Provides some benefits if policy lapses for nonpayment of premiums or if cancelled by insured. Rider must be in effect for 3 years and be in effect when the policy ends. Provides full MBA and a reduced TBA equal to the greater of: the total amount of premium paid; or 1x MBA. Available at initial application only.

values.value: Cash Benefit Rider: Full MBA paid as cash payment (regardless of actual charges incurred) instead of reimbursement for covered services. Available at initial application only; $1MM TBA not available. Benefits paid over annual IRC limit may be taxable.

fields.bestValue: Cash Benefit Rider: Full MBA paid as cash payment (regardless of actual charges incurred) instead of reimbursement for covered services. Available at initial application only; $1MM TBA not available. Benefits paid over annual IRC limit may be taxable.

values.value: GUARANTEED PURCHASE OPTION (GPO) (INCLUDED WITH SIMPLE ADVANTAGE ONLY)

fields.bestValue: GUARANTEED PURCHASE OPTION (GPO) (INCLUDED WITH SIMPLE ADVANTAGE ONLY)

values.value: Insured able to purchase additional coverage every 3 years, up to age 65, with no additional underwriting. Premium for increase in coverage is at attained age rates. Lifetime maximum increase available is 2x initial TBA and 2x initial MBA. Minimum of 25% of initial coverage must be purchased each time GPO is exercised.

fields.bestValue: Insured able to purchase additional coverage every 3 years, up to age 65, with no additional underwriting. Premium for increase in coverage is at attained age rates. Lifetime maximum increase available is 2x initial TBA and 2x initial MBA. Minimum of 25% of initial coverage must be purchased each time GPO is exercised.

values.value: BENEFIT INCREASE OPTIONS (AVAILABLE WITH CUSTOM ADVANTAGE ONLY)

values.value: FUTURE PURCHASE OPTION (FPO): Increases the MBA and remaining portion of the TBA automatically by 5% of the MBA/remaining TBA in effect at the end of the previous policy year. Available subject to certain conditions and underwriting.

rows: Comprehensive; Monthly Reimbursement (Cash Benefit Rider available - see below)
Comprehensive; Monthly Reimbursement (Cash Benefit Rider available - see below)

Reimbursed up to 100% of MBA; Home care services including Nursing Care, Therapy services, Care Advisory Services, Homemaker Services; Services provided by a Home Care Aide, Social Worker or Independent Caregiver; Hospice Care; Adult Day Care
Reimbursed up to 100% of MBA; Assisted Living Facility, Nursing Home, Hospice Facility
100 Calendar Days; Once per lifetime and cumulative

A MetLife Care Coordinator may authorize benefits for OLTC services not specifically defined as covered services under the policy, as long as the service meets the needs of the insured and is a cost-effective alternative.
Reimburses up to 50 days per calendar year for actual charges incurred, to reserve insured's bed in a facility for any reason
If insured dies on or before his/her 70th birthday, 100% of premiums paid, minus any benefits paid or payable, will be returned to insured's beneficiary or estate

Pays a cash benefit equal to 50% of the MBA when the insured is outside the U.S.; TBA limited to lesser of TBA loss benefits paid while insured in the U.S.; EP for International Benefit doubled to 200 Calendar Days; If Cash Benefit Rider added, International Benefit modified to pay benefits outside US at 100% of MBA; EP will be 100 Calendar Days

Limited coverage if policy ends due to non-payment of premiums or insured's written request to cancel, following a substantial premium increase; provides full MBA and a reduced TBA equal to greater of total amount of premium paid or 1x MBA; total benefits paid will not exceed the TBA immediately prior to the nonforfeiture date
1 visit per lifetime; EP does not need to be satisfied; If Care Management organization is selected by MetLife – no cost to the insured; If selected by insured – reimbursed up to $275 per lifetime
Premiums waived when EP is satisfied and the insured is receiving payment of benefits
Coordination of Benefits (COB) and non-duplication of coverage with other MetLife LTCI coverage and Medicare; not applicable with Cash Benefit Rider
Standard Pay: Annual, Semi-Annual, Quarterly, Monthly (EFT); 10 Year Premium Payment Rider available at initial application only; may impact tax deductibility of premium; consult tax advisor
MetLife Care Coordinators available to answer questions about LTC coverage, services and discounts; advice on caring for a loved one even if not insured with MetLife
30% Spousal; 15% Marital; 15% Residential; 10% Preferred Health (N/A for insureds age 80-84); 5% or 10% Multi-Life Discount for approved cases
Preferred (N/A for insureds age 80-84), Standard & Substandard (Always quote Standard!)
Premium based on age 30 days prior to application date (underwriting based on age at date of signed application)
With Premium: Date all underwriting requirements are met (Conditional Receipt may apply); Without Premium: 28 days following underwriting approval date
Insured has 30 days to review policy and return it for a full refund if desired
Policy Delivery Receipt (PDR) must be signed within 30 days of Policy Approval Date

fields.name: Title
fields.value: Policy Features and Benefits May Vary By State

fields.name: Section Header
fields.value: FEATURES & BENEFITS AVAILABLE WITH BOTH SIMPLE ADVANTAGE™ AND CUSTOM ADVANTAGE™

fields.name: Home and Community Care
fields.value: Reimbursed up to 100% of MBA; Home care services including Nursing Care, Therapy services, Care Advisory Services, Homemaker Services; Services provided by a Home Care Aide, Social Worker or Independent Caregiver; Hospice Care; Adult Day Care

fields.name: Facility Care
fields.value: Reimbursed up to 100% of MBA; Assisted Living Facility, Nursing Home, Hospice Facility

fields.name: Elimination Period
fields.value: 100 Calendar Days; Once per lifetime and cumulative

fields.name: Alternate Service Provision
fields.value: A MetLife Care Coordinator may authorize benefits for OLTC services not specifically defined as covered services under the policy, as long as the service meets needs of the insured and is a cost-effective alternative.

fields.name: Bed Reservation
fields.value: Reimburses up to 50 days per calendar year for actual charges incurred, to reserve insured's bed in a facility for any reason

fields.name: Return of Premium
fields.value: If insured dies on or before his/her 70th birthday, 100% of premiums paid, minus any benefits paid or payable, will be returned to insured's beneficiary or estate

fields.name: International Benefit
fields.value: Pays a cash benefit equal to 50% of the MBA when the insured is outside the U.S.; TBA limited to lesser of TBA loss benefits paid while insured in U.S. or 2% (or 50% of TBA); EP for International Benefit is doubled to 200 Calendar Days; If Cash Benefit Rider is added, International Benefit is modified; pays benefits outside US at 100% of MBA; EP will be 100 Calendar Days

fields.name: Contingent Benefit Upon Lapse
fields.value: Limited coverage if policy ends due to non-payment of premiums or insured's written request to cancel, following a substantial premium increase; Provides full MBA and a reduced TBA equal to greater of: the total amount of premium paid; or 1x MBA; Total benefits paid will not exceed the TBA immediately prior to nonforfeiture date

fields.name: Initial Needs Assessment
fields.value: 1 visit per lifetime; EP does not need to be satisfied; If Care Management organization is selected by MetLife – no cost to the insured; If Care Management organization is selected by the insured – reimbursed up to $275 per lifetime

fields.name: Premium Waiver
fields.value: Premiums waived when EP is satisfied and the insured is receiving payment of benefits

fields.name: Coordination of Benefits
fields.value: Coordination of Benefits (COB) and non-duplication of coverage with other MetLife LTCI coverage and Medicare (COB and non-duplication of coverage not applicable with Cash Benefit Rider)

fields.name: Additional Information Section Header
fields.value: ADDITIONAL INFORMATION FOR ALL POLICIES

fields.name: Payment Options
fields.value: Standard Pay: Annual, Semi-Annual, Quarterly, Monthly (EFT); 10 Year Premium Payment Rider – available at initial application only; N/A with FPO or GPO; May impact the tax deductibility of the premium; consult a tax advisor

fields.name: Care Coordination Services
fields.value: MetLife Care Coordinators are available to answer questions about LTC coverage, services and discounts in the insured's area; an insured can also call for advice about caring for a loved one who needs LTC services, even if their family member is not insured with MetLife

fields.name: Discounts
fields.value: 30% Spousal**; 15% Marital**; 15% Residential – 10% Preferred Health (N/A for insureds age 80 - 84) – 5% or 10% Multi-Life Discount for approved cases

fields.name: Underwriting Classes
fields.value: Preferred (N/A for insureds age 80 - 84), Standard & Substandard (Always quote Standard!)

fields.name: Save Age
fields.value: Premium based on age 30 days prior to application date (underwriting requirements based on age at date of signed application)

fields.name: Policy Effective Dates
fields.value: With Premium (Conditional Receipt may apply): Date all underwriting requirements are met; Without Premium: 28 days following underwriting approval date

fields.name: Free Look Period
fields.value: Insured has 30 days to review policy and if desired, return it for a full refund

fields.name: Policy Delivery
fields.value: Policy Delivery Receipt (PDR) must be signed within 30 days of Policy Approval Date

fields.name: Company Name
fields.value: Metropolitan Life Insurance Company

fields.name: Company Address
fields.value: New York, NY 10166
